predicate.note: Frames file for 'err' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to make an error or a mistake

example.name: with manner
example.text: Of course , [*] simply buying computers does n't always solve problems , and many American companies have erred by [*-2] purchasing technology [0] they did n't understand [*T*-1] .
